text: Bi Guyun (1930 â€“ 7 January 2023) was a Chinese actor. Bi was an Chinese Peking Opera performer and a first-class actor. He was head of Red Star Peking Opera Troupe and Minsheng Peking Opera Troupe. He was awarded . Guyun died at the Shanghai Ninth People's Hospital in Shanghai on 7 January 2023, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Actors from Shanghai Category:20th-century Chinese actors
title: Bi Guyun
